mapper.select: select e_number, e_point, date(e_date) as e_date, m_id from earned_point where m_id = #{id} order by e_date desc
select d_number, d_point, date(d_date) as d_date, m_id from deducted_point where m_id = #{id} order by d_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into deducted_point (d_point, d_date, m_id) values (#{point}, now(), #{id});
insert into earned_point (e_point, e_date, m_id) values (#{point}, now(), #{id})
